version_description: - Added Ukulele chord diagrams and font
- Stability improvements and bug fixes
Bug fixes

Blues
- 12 new Blues styles are now available as a one time In-App purchase
- Each Blues style comes with guitar, keyboard, bass and drums tracks

iCloud Sync
- Upload your songs and playlists to iCloud for safekeeping and for synchronization across any of your iCloud enabled devices such as iPhone, iPad or Mac

Improvements to audio
- Change tempo during playback
- Change instrument sounds during playback (Except drums)
- Exporting audio is now very fast
- Added two new electric guitars

8.0.1:
Bug fixes

Fixes for iOS 11

8.0:
Blues
- 12 new Blues styles are now available as a one time In-App purchase
- Each Blues style comes with guitar, keyboard, bass and drums tracks

iCloud Sync
- Upload your songs and playlists to iCloud for safekeeping and for synchronization across any of your iCloud enabled devices such as iPhone, iPad or Mac

Improvements to audio
- Change tempo during playback
- Change instrument sounds during playback (Except drums)
- Exporting audio is now very fast
- Added two new electric guitars

8.0.4:
- Fixes for iOS 11 and iPhone X
- Fixed issue with softer first count in click on older devices

8.0:
Blues
- 12 new Blues styles are now available as a one time In-App purchase
- Each Blues style comes with guitar, keyboard, bass and drums tracks

iCloud Sync
- Upload your songs and playlists to iCloud for safekeeping and for synchronization across any of your iCloud enabled devices such as iPhone, iPad or Mac

Improvements to audio
- Change tempo during playback
- Change instrument sounds during playback (Except drums)
- Exporting audio is now very fast
- Added two new electric guitars

This is a bug fix release with the following minor changes and fixes:

- Added + button in the Playlists tab to create a new playlist
- Minor performance improvement when pressing play
- Fixed segno drawing with hand font
- Fixed issue with navigation between song view and song list when searching where table view would jump up
- Keep search bar visible while searching in a playlist in iOS 11
- Correctly show an error message when trying to export audio for a song that cannot be played
- Updated AudioBus SDK to 3.0.3.1
- Updated AirTurn SDK to 3.2.1
- Fixed exported audio levels of instruments
- Fixed layout issue with long playlist names in list
- Fixed .html file import instruction
- Fixed rare crash in main song list when searching - rotating - trashing
- Fixed issue where starting measure number wasn’t automatically reset when song reached the end of the playback

- Added option to share a whole playlist as a pdf
- Added option to Duplicate a playlist
- Added option to share a Playlist as a text format setlist
- Added option to rename a playlist by swiping and selecting the More option
- Added option to rename a playlist by tapping on the Title while viewing the playlist
- Implemented multiple selection for faster deletion/trashing of songs in playlists
- Added support for new tap-n-hold playlist reordering available in iOS 11

In this version:
- Fixed size of PDF when printing.

In version 8.2:
- Added option to share a whole playlist as a pdf
- Added option to Duplicate a playlist
- Added option to share a Playlist as a text format setlist
- Added option to rename a playlist by swiping and selecting the More option
- Added option to rename a playlist by tapping on the Title while viewing the playlist
- Implemented multiple selection for faster deletion/trashing of songs in playlists
- Added support for new tap-n-hold playlist reordering available in iOS 11
Bug fixes and improvements
Fix for crash when recording with lightning port headphones
Fixes for compatibility with AirPlay 2

New:
- Added setting for tuning of backing tracks from standard A4 = 440 Hz to values between 430-450 Hz

Styles improvements:
- Fixed 3/8 timing of organ in Pop - Funk
- Better mix between instruments in Blues - Flat Tire
- Increased volume of organ in Blues - Mo-Slo
- Simplified bass line for one-beat chords in Blues - Mo-Slo
- Minor tweaks to Blues - Chicago Shuffle
- Fixed bass playing a minor 7th on major triads in Blues - Funky and Stax
Fixed an issue on some bluetooth speakers where the first click of the count in would be too soft or inaudible
Minor bug fixes

- Added a new import flow that lets you preview the songs and playlists before importing them
- Added support for new iPhone and iPad Pro models
- Improved support for Apple Watch playback controls
- Added option to share exported audio from previous exports or recordings in case of failure
- Updated AirTurn with support for newest bluetooth pedals
- Increased tuning range to 415-466 (a semitone up and down)
- Increased size of repeat indicator text
- iReal Pro now requires iOS 11.4 or higher
This update contains fixes for some minor issues

- Added the option to sort the list of playlists alphabetically
- Removed option to disable Background audio in Settings
- Rearranged Find results for easier access to YouTube and Web search results

- Fixes for upcoming version on iOS
- Ignore accents when searching
- Improved persistence of last viewed song and playlist when restarting the app on iPad
Minor fixes for upcoming version of iOS

- Fixes issues with the search layout in iOS 13
- Disables split view in landscape on iPhones with large screens
- Various cosmetic fixes for iOS 13

- IMPROVED Pop-Rock style with a second harmony part and new variations in the drums and bass parts between A and B sections
- Dropped support for iOS 11
- Added a Share Extension for a more seamless experience when importing iReal Pro files (.html)
- Updated the AirTurn SDK to v3.7.2
- Fix in the editor for the keyboard going up and down quickly every time you switch between chords and text
- Added a close X button when inputing staff text in the editor for better experience on iPad with external keyboard
- Updated the audio engine for better performance

- IMPROVED the Pop-Country style with an additional acoustic guitar part
- IMPROVED the Pop-Slow Rock style with an additional organ part
- Fixed an issue when recording on older devices where the last few seconds would be cut off
- Fixed a rare crash on stopping playback
- Fixed an issue with AirTurn not working on restarting the app
- Updated AirTurn SDK to v3.7.4

- Improved Blues Funky guitar part
- Fix drum pattern in Pop Slow Rock when playing time signatures other than 4/4

- Added a second harmony part (Organ) to the Pop Reggae style
- Added a second harmony part (Guitar) to the Pop Rock 12/8 style

- Fix crash when playing Pop Rock 12/8 in 2/4 or 6/8 time signature
- Better endings in all Blues and Pop styles

- Updated Cuba-Son Montuno 2-3 and 3-2 styles
- Improve search with high quality results at the top
- Fixed Pop RnB Rhodes part going out of sync on long songs
- Change guitar part in Blues Lucille to play long notes with 4 chords per measure
- Fix issue with songs in 7/4 and 9/8 time signatures not playing a drum crash at the beginning of song sections
- Improved voicing selection for keyboard and guitar instruments to avoid really high and low registers
- Added small disclosure indicator in chord diagrams to help discover alternate options
- Improved support for AirTurn
- Fixed volume getting louder with distortions when adding reverb in the mixer
- Replaced song view background color picker with newer version
- Updated Piano, Guitar, Ukulele and Chord Scale Libraries with better scrolling and position indicators

New in 2020.7.1:
- Minor bug fixes

New in 2020.7:
- Updated Cuba-Son Montuno 2-3 and 3-2 styles
- Improve search with high quality results at the top
- Fixed Pop RnB Rhodes part going out of sync on long songs
- Change guitar part in Blues Lucille to play long notes with 4 chords per measure
- Fix issue with songs in 7/4 and 9/8 time signatures not playing a drum crash at the beginning of song sections
- Improved voicing selection for keyboard and guitar instruments to avoid really high and low registers
- Added small disclosure indicator in chord diagrams to help discover alternate options
- Improved support for AirTurn
- Fixed volume getting louder with distortions when adding reverb in the mixer
- Replaced song view background color picker with newer version
- Updated Piano, Guitar, Ukulele and Chord Scale Libraries with better scrolling and position indicators

- New design and layout of song list and playlists
- Support for Dark Mode
- New screen when creating a New Song where you can set all the song info before starting to edit
- New screen for more easily adding songs to a playlist from within the playlist with a simple search
- New feature: search for songs from home screen Spotlight search
- Added support for new iPhone 12 models
- Added support for trackpad on iPad
- Accessibility improvements for Voice-Over reading of the chord chart
- Improved Forums so that you remain logged in when sharing songs to the Forums from the song view
- Fixed PDF size for better printing
- Fixed add9 chord voicings so that the 9th is not at the top
- Added foot Hi-Hat sound to click sounds (useful for 2 & 4 click track)
- Tweaked swipe actions in various song lists to help avoid accidental song deletion
- Dropped support for iOS 12

- Added support for drum breaks! Insert the word “Break” in the staff text and the drums will stop with a shot on one until the next double bar line.
- Added two new chord qualities: minor add 9 (-add9) and diminished major 7th (o^7).
- Fixed issue with scrolling in landscape so that current measure always stays centered.
- Change behavior of the Full Screen setting on iPad: it now also hides the side bar in addition to hiding the player controls
- Fixed issue that prevented importing of playlist sent through the support chat
- Don’t show import preview window when importing existing single song and override player settings in existing song with incoming imported song

- Hide keyboard after selecting a song from search results on iPad
- Improved performance of song search
- Fixed A6/E guitar chord diagram
Minor fixes and improvements
